parameters.name: App
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: AudioBitrate
parameters.description: The bitrate of the output audio. Unit: Kbit/s. Valid values: **1 to 1000**.

parameters.name: AudioChannelNum
parameters.description:
The number of sound channels. Valid values:

*   **1**: mono
*   **2**: binaural

parameters.name: AudioCodec
parameters.description:
The audio encoding format. Valid values:

*   **AAC**
*   **MP3**

parameters.name: AudioRate
parameters.description:
The audio sampling rate. Valid values: **22050 to 96000**.

>  If you set AudioProfile to aac_ld, the audio sampling rate cannot exceed 44100.

parameters.name: EncryptParameters
parameters.description:
The encryption configuration. The value is a JSON string. The following fields are included in the syntax:

*   EncryptType: the type of encryption. Set the value to aliyun.
*   KmsKeyID: the ID of the CMK in KMS.
*   KmsKeyExpireInterval: the rotation period of the CMK. Valid values: 60 to 3600. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: FPS
parameters.description: The frame rate of the output video. Unit: frames per second (FPS). Valid values: **1 to 60**.

parameters.name: Gop
parameters.description: The group of pictures (GOP) size of the output video. Unit: frame. Valid values: **1 to 3000**.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description:
The height of the output video. Unit: pixel. The value must comply with all the following rules:

*   **Height ≥ 100**: The height of the video is at least 100 pixels.
*   **max(Height,Width) ≤ 2560**: The width or height of the video, whichever is greater, cannot exceed 2,560 pixels.
*   **min(Height,Width) ≤ 1440**: The width or height of the video, whichever is smaller, cannot exceed 1,440 pixels.

> The resolution of a video that is transcoded by using the H.265 Narrowband HD™ transcoding template cannot exceed 1280 × 720 pixels.

parameters.name: KmsKeyExpireInterval
parameters.description: The rotation period of the CMK. Valid values: 60 to 3600. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: KmsKeyID
parameters.description: The ID of the customer master key (CMK) in Key Management Service (KMS).

parameters.name: KmsUID
parameters.description: The ID of the KMS account.

parameters.name: Profile
parameters.description:
The codec profile. The video codec profile determines how ApsaraVideo Live performs codec on the video. In normal cases, a greater value indicates a higher image quality and requires more codec resources. Valid values:

*   **1**: baseline, which is suitable for mobile devices.
*   **2**: main, which is suitable for standard-definition devices.
*   **3**: high, which is suitable for high-definition devices.

parameters.name: Template
parameters.description:
The name of the custom transcoding template.

> The name can contain digits, letters, and hyphens (-), and must start with a letter or digit. The name must be different from the names of default transcoding templates.

parameters.name: TemplateType
parameters.description:
The type of the custom transcoding template. Valid values:

*   **h264**: custom H.264 standard transcoding template
*   **h264-nbhd**: custom H.264 Narrowband HD™ transcoding template
*   **h265**: custom H.265 standard transcoding template
*   **h265-nbhd**: custom H.265 Narrowband HD™ transcoding template
*   **audio**: audio-only template

> If you set **TemplateType** to **h264**, **h264-nbhd**, **h265** or **h265-nbhd**, the **Height**, **Width**, **FPS**, and **VideoBitrate** parameters are required.

parameters.name: VideoBitrate
parameters.description:
The bitrate of the output video. Unit: Kbit/s. Valid values: **1 to 6000**.

> The bitrate of the output video is as close to the value that you specify as possible, but not exactly the same as the value, especially when the value is excessively large or small.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description:
The width of the output video. Unit: pixel.

The value must comply with all the following rules:

*   **Width ≥ 100**: The width of the video is at least 100 pixels.
*   **max(Height,Width) ≤ 2560**: The width or height of the video, whichever is greater, cannot exceed 2,560 pixels.
*   **min(Height,Width) ≤ 1440**: The width or height of the video, whichever is smaller, cannot exceed 1,440 pixels.

> The resolution of a video that is transcoded by using the H.265 Narrowband HD™ transcoding template cannot exceed 1280 × 720 pixels.
